https://tmrev.io/movie/511497-Bully Dance 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/vt9rqvX5OcjnDFd8TiG5Tn2VILK.jpg The "stick people" in Bully Dance are imaginary, but this gritty tale is all too familiar. Like the dance beat pulsating throughout the film, the bully's intimidation of a smaller victim is unrelenting; no one stops the dance until serious harm is inflicted. While Bully Dance offers no simple solutions, it does compel viewers--teachers, parents and children--to take stock of their actions and to find ways to end peer abuse. Bully Dance
